content: Aug 17 Blood collection tubes made by Becton Dickinson & Co that were used in conjunction with Magellan Diagnostics' lead-testing devices are still being investigated as a potential cause of inaccurate lead test results.

title: Europe M&A surges but U.S. slows sharply amid uncertainty

content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) NEW YORK  May 23 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has assigned a 'BBB-' rating to Becton  Dickinson and Company's (BDX) senior unsecured Euro notes offering. The company intends to use the net proceeds from the offering to fund the purchase of existing notes pursuant to the tender  to fund the purchase and retirement of debt in open market transactions  or otherwise  for general corporate purposes. A full list of ratings appears at the end of the
name: Becton Dickinson and Company
title: Fitch Rates Becton  Dickinson and Company's Senior Euro Notes 'BBB-'; Outlook Stable

content: (The following statement was released by the rating agency) CHICAGO  May 22 (Fitch) Fitch Ratings has assigned a 'BBB-' rating to Becton  Dickinson and Company's (BDX) senior unsecured notes offering. The company intends to use net proceeds from the offering to partly finance the acquisition of C.R. Bard (Bard) and redeem outstanding BDX notes. A full list of ratings appears at the end of the release. The ratings apply to approximately $10.3 billion of debt outstanding at March 31  2017. The Rat
name: Becton Dickinson and Company
title: Fitch Rates Becton  Dickinson and Company's Senior Notes 'BBB-'; Outlook Stable

content: NEW YORK U.S. medical equipment supplier Becton Dickinson and Co will acquire C R Bard Inc  in a $24 billion cash-and-stock deal  adding Bard's devices to its portfolio in the high-growth sectors of oncology and surgery  both companies said on Sunday. | Video
name: Becton Dickinson and Company
title: Becton Dickinson to acquire Bard for $24 billion

content: NEW YORK  April 23 U.S. medical equipment supplier Becton Dickinson and Co will acquire C R Bard Inc  in a $24 billion cash-and-stock deal  adding Bard's devices to its portfolio in the high-growth sectors of oncology and surgery  both companies said on Sunday.
name: Becton Dickinson and Company
title: UPDATE 3-Becton Dickinson to acquire Bard for $24 billion

content: NEW YORK  April 23 Becton Dickinson and Co will acquire C R Bard Inc in a $24 billion deal that will give shareholders of the target about 15 percent of the combined entity  the two medical technology companies said on Sunday.
name: Becton Dickinson and Company
title: BD to acquire Bard in $24 bln medical tech deal

content: BRUSSELS U.S. medical equipment supplier Becton Dickinson & Co  gained European Union approval on Friday for its $12.2 billon bid for peer CareFusion Corp  after regulators said the market would continue to be highly competitive following the deal.
